Pages.Title: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?
Pages.LinkTitle: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?

Questions.Label: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation's total annual turnover was over £75 million for the last financial year

Pages.BodyText:
You can find your organisation's total annual turnover on its:

  • 'profit and loss statement'
  • 'income and expenditure account'
  • 'statement of financial activities'

Pages.Title: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?
Pages.LinkTitle: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Questions.Label: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation expects its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover

Pages.BodyText:
We'll check your organisation's financial statements to confirm your answer.

If your answer is incorrect, we may ask you to provider further financial information for your organisation.

Details.Title: Show me an example
Details.Body:
Your organisation's total annual turnover is £80 million and it expects to receive £3 million of funding from the ESFA.

This is less than 5% of its total annual turnover, so the answer is yes.

Pages.Title: Financial evidence

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'profit and loss statement', 'income and expenditure account' or 'statement of financial activities'.

Validations.Name: Regex

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year
Questions.Hint:
You will need to add up a total of:
  • bank overdraft
  • loans
  • amounts owed to directors - including director loans and director accounts
  • amounts owed to subsidiaries - if your organisation is part of a group
  • amounts due under finance leases or hire purchase contracts

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Pages.Title: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation produced its latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has produced full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's latest full financial statements covering a minimum of 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Financial statements must include a:

  • balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed on the last day of the financial year
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit and loss it made over the financial year
  • detailed notes about the accounts
  • breakdown of creditors and borrowings

If applicable, financial statements should be signed and filed with Companies House or the Charity Commission of England and Wales.

The file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

! WarningFinancial statements must not be abbreviated, filleted or for a micro entity.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select your organisation's full financial statements covering the last 12 months

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has produced financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months

Pages.Title: What you need to upload
Pages.BodyText:
You'll need to upload your organisation's:

  • financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
  • management accounts covering the remaining period to date

Your management accounts must start from the date your financial statements end.

For example, if your financial statements end on 31 January, your management accounts must start on 1 February.

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Financial statements must include a:

  • balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit and loss it's made
  • detailed notes about the accounts
  • breakdown of creditors and borrowings

If applicable, financial statements should be signed and filed with Companies House or the Charity Commission of England and Wales.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

! WarningFinancial statements must not be abbreviated, filleted or for a micro entity.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select your organisation's financial statements covering any period within the last 12 months

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date

Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Management accounts must include:

  • a balance sheet - showing the value of everything your organisation owns, owes and is owed to date
  • a cash flow statement
  • profit and loss account - showing your organisation's sales, running costs and profit and loss it's made
  • detailed notes about any assumptions made

Your management accounts must start from the date your financial statements end.

Each file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.
Questions.Hint: Upload management accounts

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select your organisation's management accounts covering the remaining period to date

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us who prepared the answers and uploads in this section
